snippet: At first, the place felt like a utopia. We were in the hub of the New York tech community, surrounded by funky people designing products that just might change the world. After two months, I gave notice that we would be moving out.
abstract: At first, the place felt like a utopia. We were in the hub of the New York tech community, surrounded by funky people designing products that just might change the world. After two months, I gave notice that we would be moving out.

headline.main: Why I Ditched My Co-Working Space
